bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.issue: Wallet account cards had white background instead of gradient colors. The card-playful class was overriding the bg-gradient-to-br classes.
bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.fix: Removed card-playful class and added explicit border/shadow styles to preserve the gradient backgrounds
bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.line_changed: Line 248: Changed className from 'card-playful p-5 bg-gradient-to-br...' to 'p-5 rounded-2xl border-3 border-[#1D3557] shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#1D3557] bg-gradient-to-br...'

critical_code_review_comments: The card-playful CSS class in index.css sets background: white which overrides Tailwind gradient classes. Consider using !important for gradients or creating separate card classes for gradient cards.
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.jsx - Fixed gradient background not rendering on wallet account cards
seed_data_creation: Created test user with wallet accounts (spending: ₹250, savings: ₹175, investing: ₹125, giving: ₹75, total: ₹625). Created test topic in content_topics collection for thumbnail testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Wallet balance is now consistent between Dashboard and Wallet page. Wallet account cards have action buttons that navigate to correct pages. Thumbnail images use object-contain with bg-white to prevent cropping. Fixed CSS bug where card-playful class was overriding gradient backgrounds on WalletPage.
